name: places/ChIJyQw7vo9ZwokR3oHeZHawTHk
adrFormatAddress: 622 Broadway, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: I lived in New York a few years ago and every time I passed in front of the legendary Rockstar Games building my heart trembled. I love you, Rockstar! There is no other game developer that comes close to your awesomeness! I'm your number 1 fan

text.text: I lived in New York a few years ago and every time I passed in front of the legendary Rockstar Games building my heart trembled. I love you, Rockstar! There is no other game developer that comes close to your awesomeness! I'm your number 1 fan

originalText.text:
I apologize for talking negatively about GTA 5 because the game is too hard to play unless you have a PC. So, yeah. GTA 5 is awesome.

However, online is completely garbage, unhealthy, and too toxic for me honestly.

The campaign is great and awesome to play. If only MICROSOFT bought the mod support and overstretched their mod rules to create more money for all Xbox games. Then this problem has never existed. Let Rockstar cook GTA 6. A couple few days or a year or so.

originalText.text: You must be very stupid if you manage to be hired there as a support employee. What is not to understand about the fact that one has to disconnect my Steam ID from an email address that no longer exists? Support says they can only do this if I send a reply from the email address that no longer exists. How logical is that? I have also mentioned only 10 times or so that that e-mail address no longer exists.

originalText.text: GTA 3 GTA VC and GTA SA were my favorite games from them growing up as a kid. I spent countless hours immersed in all 3 games and it was the best feeling ever. With a new GTA 6 game on the way in 2025! It makes sense that it will be going back to the 80s. I would love to see that location too and It looks like they will be revisiting it again. Thank you rockstar for all the memories and I am proud to say that you also shaped me into a gamer. Keep up the good work.ðŸ¥°

originalText.text: Horrible company that only cares about microtransactions and selling shark cards for a game that's over 10 years old. No PS5 upgrade for Red Dead redemption 2, no new games from the other franchises they let die(Bully, Max Payne, Manhunt, etc). Charging $50 for a remake of a PS3 game, that got a 60fps upgrade before RDR2. I personally won't be buying any new Rockstar games until they are deeply discounted including GTA6. Rockstar would rather scam children with microtransactions and continuously rerelease GTA5 than even bother updating RDR2, just another disgraceful corporation that cares more about selling online shark cards to children than listening to its customers.
